net.manu_faktur.kiss.name: Keep Inventory Sorted, Simple
net.manu_faktur.kiss.config.middleclick: Middle click slot to sort inventory
net.manu_faktur.kiss.config.doubleclick: Double click slot to sort inventory
net.manu_faktur.kiss.config.seperatebtn: Always display button for player inv
net.manu_faktur.kiss.config.debugtooltip:
The tooltip when hovering over a sort button 
will list instruction to ignore that inventory
net.manu_faktur.kiss.config.hidetooltip:
Neither the opened inventory, nor your player inventory 
will be sortable when this inventory is opened
net.manu_faktur.kiss.config.nosorttoolti:
The opened inventory's sort button will not be visible, 
only the player's when this inventory is opened
net.manu_faktur.kiss.sorting.invalid: Not looking at a valid inventory
net.manu_faktur.kiss.sorttype.name: Name
net.manu_faktur.kiss.sortbtn.dnsadd: to automatically add to the Do Not Sort Inv list
net.manu_faktur.kiss.sortbtn.dndadd: to automatically add to the Hide Sort Buttons list
net.manu_faktur.kiss.sortbtn.error: Screen is not ignorable or already on ignore list
